turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I want to order a coffee from Peet's.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, which Peet's location do you want to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you order from the one on Throckmorton for pickup?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I'll place the order from the Peet's at 88 Throckmorton in Mill Valley. What would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get an iced latte?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Medium, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, and what kind of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What kinds do they have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 2%, whole, non-fat, soy, or almond.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Almond, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Would you like anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do they offer any flavors for the latte?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: From what I can tell, no, they don't offer any types of syrups, but you can order a caramel, mocha, vanilla, or white chocolate latte individually.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, can we switch my order to an iced caramel latte?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. Same almond milk and medium size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's all, thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, your order is placed and a receipt has been sent to your phone via text. Your order from the Peet's on Throckmorton will be ready for pickup shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you!
